mapper.sql: BAR_DebitTransaction.ID as ID ,BAR_DebitTransaction.Discount as Discount ,BAR_DebitTransaction.AccountNO as AccountNO ,BAR_DebitTransaction.UploadDateTime as UploadDateTime ,BAR_DebitTransaction.UnpackDateTime as UnpackDateTime ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TxnAmount as TxnAmount ,BAR_DebitTransaction.SettleDateTime as SettleDateTime ,BAR_DebitTransaction.Direction as Direction ,BAR_DebitTransaction.RecordTAC as RecordTAC ,BAR_DebitTransaction.AppVersion as AppVersion ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TxnDateTime as TxnDateTime ,BAR_DebitTransaction.DebitStatus as DebitStatus ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TerminalNO as TerminalNO ,BAR_DebitTransaction.Counter as Counter ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TerminalCounter as TerminalCounter ,BAR_DebitTransaction.SummaryDateTime as SummaryDateTime ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TxnTypeID as TxnTypeID ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TxnBalance as TxnBalance ,BAR_DebitTransaction.StartStationCode as StartStationCode ,BAR_DebitTransaction.EndStaionTime as EndStaionTime ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TicketPrice as TicketPrice ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TicketData as TicketData ,BAR_DebitTransaction.FromFileID as FromFileID ,BAR_DebitTransaction.EndStationCode as EndStationCode ,BAR_DebitTransaction.UpdateStatusDateTime as UpdateStatusDateTime ,BAR_DebitTransaction.CardTypeID as CardTypeID ,BAR_DebitTransaction.StartStationTime as StartStationTime ,BAR_DebitTransaction.MerchantCode as MerchantCode ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TicketMac as TicketMac ,BAR_DebitTransaction.KerVersion as KerVersion ,BAR_DebitTransaction.DriverNO as DriverNO ,BAR_DebitTransaction.TerminalID as TerminalID ,BAR_DebitTransaction.Balance as Balance ,BAR_DebitTransaction.CompanyCode as CompanyCode ,BAR_DebitTransaction.[LineNO] as [LineNO]
mapper.select:
select count(*) from BAR_DebitTransaction_DistanceError err LEFT JOIN BAR_DebitTransaction deb ON err.MerchantCode = deb.MerchantCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bu.MerchantCode, bu.BusNO, de.DeptName, li.LineCode, li.LineName, dr.DriverNO, dr.DriverName FROM OPT_Bus bu LEFT JOIN OPT_Driver dr ON bu.LineID = dr.LineID LEFT JOIN OPT_Line li ON bu.DeptID = li.DeptID LEFT JOIN OPT_Department de ON bu.DeptID = de.ID ) aa ON aa.MerchantCode = err.MerchantCode
and (err.AccountNO like '${searchvalue}%' or err.[LineNO] like '${searchvalue}%' or err.TerminalNO like '${searchvalue}%' or aa.DriverNO like '${searchvalue}%') and deb.SummaryDateTime >= '${sdate} 0:00:00' and deb.SummaryDateTime <= '${edate} 23:59:59' AND aa.DeptName = #{deptName} AND aa.LineName = #{lineName} AND aa.DriverNO = #{driverNO} AND aa.BusNO = #{busNO} AND deb.MerchantCode IN (select MapMerchantCode from BAR_Merchant WHERE merchantcode= #{merchantCode})
